subject: Track and Field
Millrose Games
Age, Chronological
Records and Achievements
lead_paragraph: In the Wanamaker Mile at the New York meet, a chief source of interest is whether Lagat, an eight-time winner, can post a time under 3:58.15, breaking the record for runners 40 and older.
snippet: In the Wanamaker Mile at the New York meet, a chief source of interest is whether Lagat, an eight-time winner, can post a time under 3:58.15, breaking the record for runners 40 and older.
